resource.chars:
<u>Rhynchonella <\u> as in <u>Waldheimia <\u> and 
a pyriform vesicle of the same nature 
but I did not observe in <u>Rhynchonella <\u>
the accessory vesicles <s>wh<\s> upon the origins of 
genital bands, which I observed once or 
twice in Waldheimia -
I could find no trace of arteries 
terminating the elongated, ovoid & nearly 
straight ‘ventricles’ of <u>Rhynchonella <\u> 
Their ends appeared truncated and 
as I have already said repeatedly 
presented a distinct external aperture.
